short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows price per person when browsing daft.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roadmap: Allow people to specify how many people are renting. Implement rules based on number of bedrooms. Allow people to sort results based on price per person.
